posts.post_title: FS/FT: T206 Lajoie batting SGC 4 - SOLD
posts.post_content:
[STRIKE][/STRIKE]Really nice Lajoie batting available. New holder SGC 4.  Asking $SOLD shipped, Will listen to offers.

If you have any PSA graded t206’s available for trade, I’m listening.

Thanks for looking!
